amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that would further restrict the right of law-abiding Americans to own a firearm.

action.text: Amendment SA 673 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 673 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 87.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 673.
Amendment SA 673 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Lee.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 673 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Lee.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 673 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 87.
